title: Jao Ngoa - Chao Ngo
description: Popular with locals and students. Menu is in Thai but owner understands a little English. Offers several different dishes each day where you could choose one or two dishes with brown rice. Also made-to-order Thai food. Also sells vegan Thai bakery goods. Located opposite Chiang Mai University north entrance near the 4th soi, look for big yellow sign on the right side just before the university.
streetAddress: Thanon Huay Kaew, 100/13 Huai Kaeo Road
